segments.text: Did you ever get a parking ticket ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I just got one the other day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The ticket was for parking in the red zone .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't understand why you would do that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There was nowhere to park , and I needed to run in and get something .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Where'd you get the ticket at ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I parked in front of my apartment building .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I really needed to be quick .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I bet that you wish you hadn't done that .
segments.speaker: S2
